summary: The module defines a manager class that orchestrates the full lifecycle of Flet application sessions within a FastAPI environment. It handles session creation, retrieval, reconnection, disconnection, and removal, while also managing temporary directories, evicting expired OAuth states and sessions, and providing an asynchronous executor and pub/sub hub for interâ€‘component communication.
business_intent: To ensure reliable, automated management of Flet web app sessions and related resources, supporting OAuth flows and scalable asynchronous operations in FastAPI deployments.
